title: Freljordian lore update anyone
body:
https://vignette1.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/0/0d/Freljord_crest.png/revision/latest?cb=20161117021436
The Teaser of the new champion ornn
And the little comments rioters let out , convinces me of just how important ornn is to the lore of the freljord. 
Now most( myself included) are convinced that the vgu of {{champion:20}} will be the one too update the lore of the freljord and that might still be the case but don't you think a champion as old as the freljord itself should herald its lore update. 
If I'm right and he does update freljordian lore then this is who I see is the most likely and unlikely to be included

Likely
{{champion:22}}{{champion:127}}{{champion:113}}: as the leaders of the major tribes at civil war, it would be insane not to include these three 
{{champion:34}}: the spirit of the freljord no doubt would be filled with tales of the region's past, And no doubt has a role to in its future 
{{champion:79}}: I want him included for the sheer purpose of having a comedic story in the mix

Unlikely 
{{champion:23}} {{champion:2}}{{champion:106}}: although they all play key roles in the freljordian lore, their high priority in the vgu list makes me doubt their inclusion in the update
{{champion:48}}{{champion:201}}:they are as updated as can be but the former needs a short story while the later could use a more detailed bio
{{champion:20}}: for the obvious reason that his vgu is very likely next year 
{{champion:77}}: his ties to the freljord are ambiguous at best as he also may have deep ties to ionia

And if I'm wrong and ornn is not the freljord lore update herald then I'm hoping for at least just a mini-lore update for the legends of the freljord 
Such as {{champion:34}} and {{champion:201}}

That's pretty dope to be a Freljordian legend -  tale of a man who decided to outdrink a god. And he could not do it, just cause Gods cann't get drunk. This legend is also would likely be tied with some nature interesting thing, like earthquake or something like that.
He's not literally a god. And you shouldn't assume the gods of whatever mythology you have in mind have the same rules as Runeterra's gods/god like beings.

Yeah if Ornn brings us a freljord update,then it seems pretty likely for the 3 princesses to receive a lore update.
I agree about Anivia also being a likely candidate,though I kinda doubt that Gragas will get one,simply because the universe page doesn't even treat him as a freljord champion anymore(Olaf seems more likely as a more comedic champion for the update)


Alternatively they might do one or two tribes for this update and then the others for the next one,but I think that is less likely to happen.

I feel like Riot needs to start bringing out actual Frozen Watchers or abandon the storyline because right now it's The Tribes + The Trolls + The Ursine + Anivia & Udyr. I'll assume Ornn is probably gonna side with them as well and you start to get the idea that Lissandra doesn't stand a chance. Oh, and the Yetis as well. Nunu & Willump would also presumably side with the Avarosa.

The only actual irrelevant champions in the Freljord are Gragas and Tryndamere (his relationship with Ashe doesn't seem to be cannon anymore ever since his lore update with the Aatrox release).

The Trolls are actually on Lissandras side.
Trundle is their king and he is Lissandra's servant.

I don't think that they have to bring a Frozen Watcher, though.
They can easily introduce other Freljord champions, which are siding with Lissandra just like Trundle. Some more "evil" Freljordians would be pretty _cool_, if you ask me.

In my opinion, the Watchers are LoL's version of ragnarok. There is the ghost with the horn warning if they return. And if they return, it might be the end for Freljord. Just because we have the story of them imprisoned there, does not mean that there has to be a Watcher able to flee.

I undrstand why peope want one and it is possible that Riot is really going this route and giving us a Watcher in the future. But it is not necessary for me.

yep i'm hoping they'll update all except {{champion:106}}  and specially {{champion:20}} because i'm hoping for a NUNU VGU next year. Trynda will not be update til 2020 so i'm hoping for a nice lore for him now.

Lastly, I also wish {{champion:79}} to be retcon as a Freljordian champ now considering Ornn has ties with him.
